children.text:
*30% off qualifying Nespresso® machines. Offer valid for purchases made between November 23, 2016 through December 8, 2016 by 11:59pm PST and in the U.S. only. Offer available only at www.nespresso.com, Nespresso® Boutiques, participating Nespresso® retailers or through the Nespresso® Club 1-877-964-6299 – while supplies last. This is a Nespresso® promotion. Offer cannot be combined with any other Nespresso® machine discount or promotion. Discount is limited to the purchase of up to five (5) qualifying machines per customer. Void where prohibited or restricted. Consumer must pay applicable sales tax. Offer cannot be applied as a credit and is not valid towards machines previously purchased and/or exchanged. No cash value. Offer not valid toward purchases of Aeroccino+, Aeroccino 4, accessories, capsules or Nespresso® Business Solutions machines. This offer may not be published without Nespresso® permission. Nestlé employees or already discounted partners are not eligible for this promotion. Two business day shipping is not guaranteed. All trademarks are owned by Société des Produits Nestlé S.A., Vevey, Switzerland. 

New Members:
**For a limited time, receive $20 off on your first (1st) Nespresso® coffee order of one hundred (100) Nespresso® coffee capsules or more when you register for a new Nespresso® Club Member account. Offer valid on qualifying purchases made between November 23, 2016 through January 5, 2017 by 11:59pm PST (the “Offer Period”). Discount is valid only on one (1) qualifying purchase per household during the Offer Period. Offer valid in the U.S. only. Customer will be responsible for any applicable taxes and shipping charges. The discount can only be used at www.nespresso.com, Nespresso® boutiques, and on Nespresso® telephone orders by calling toll free at 1-877-964-6299. Offer cannot be combined with any other Nespresso® coffee discounts or promotions. Void where prohibited or restricted. This offer may not be published without Nespresso® permission. Fraudulent or duplicate requests are void and will not be fulfilled. Discount cannot be applied towards Nespresso® Business Solutions accounts or products. Discount cannot be redeemed or exchanged for cash. This is a Nespresso® offer and is not valid for Nestlé employees or already discounted partners. Nespresso® is a registered trademark of Société des Produits Nestlé S.A., Vevey, Switzerland. 

Existing Members:
**For a limited time, receive a $20 Nespresso® Credit (“Credit”) on your Nespresso® Club account when you purchase any Nespresso® machine and you complete the Nespresso® Credit Redemption process via calling the Nespresso® Club at 1-877-776-6601. Offer valid on qualifying purchases made between November 23, 2016 through January 5, 2017 by 11:59pm PST (the “Offer Period”). Only one (1) Credit can be received per household during the Offer Period. Offer valid in the U.S. only. Upon receipt of the qualifying machine serial number (and purchase receipt for qualifying machine if requested), via telephone at 1-877-776-6601, a Credit will be applied to the designated Nespresso® Club account and will be valid towards the purchase of coffee orders of at least one hundred (100) capsules. Consumer will be responsible for any applicable taxes and shipping charges. The Credit can only be used at Nespresso® telephone orders by calling toll free at 1-877-776-6601. Offer cannot be combined with any other Nespresso® discounts or promotions. Offer will not be processed without valid requested machine serial number and purchase receipt and SUBMITTED MATERIALS MUST BE PROVIDED NO LATER THAN JANUARY 31st, 2017. Void where prohibited or restricted. This offer may not be published without Nespresso® permission. Fraudulent or duplicate requests are void and will not be fulfilled. Credit cannot be applied towards Nespresso® Business Solutions accounts or products. Credit cannot be redeemed or exchanged for cash. This is a Nespresso® offer and is not valid for Nestlé employees or already discounted partners. Nespresso® is a registered trademark of Société des Produits Nestlé S.A., Vevey, Switzerland.
